Tulsa.Tulsa Promenade: Tulsa Promenade Mall is a 926,426-square-foot (86,067.8 m2) shopping center located in the Midtown section of Tulsa, Oklahoma. It is anchored by Dillard's, JCPenney and a third anchor store last occupied by Mervyn's until 2005 and a fourth anchor last occupied by Macy's until March 26th, 2017. The mall sits on 22 acres of land.
